lead_paragraph: Former FIFA President Sepp Blatter received compensation payments that were "proper, fair and in line" with those of the heads of major professional sports leagues, his U.S.-based lawyer said on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Blatter Compensation 'Proper, Fair', His U.S. Lawyer Says
headline.main: Blatter Compensation 'Proper, Fair', His U.S. Lawyer Says

snippet: Former FIFA President Sepp Blatter received compensation payments that were "proper, fair and in line" with those of the heads of major professional sports leagues, his U.S.-based lawyer said on Friday....
